channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0372; 08:28AM; 6322 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Qwnpbz; Hyde Park; KNOCKDOWN: The first alarm response of 30 firefighters (prior to arrival of additionally requested resources) extinguished the fire in 19 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters conducted a primary and secondary search with no occupants located. No other structures were damaged. No further details.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E226 E233 E266 E33 E46 E57 E66 EM11 RA266 RA866 SO1 SQ21 T26 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0372; 08:09AM; 6322 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Qwnpbz; Hyde Park; Two story, single family dwelling (vacant, boarded up) with moderate smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E46 E57 E66 RA266 RA866 SQ21 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Fatality Vehicle Fire; INC#1566; 07:11PM; 1792 N Pasadena Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3srqgdR; #LincolnHeights; Earlier this evening, fire crews extinguished an automobile fire and then, sadly, discovered that one person was deceased, relating to the fire. LAFD Investigators are looking into the circumstances surrounding the incident. LAPD Inc #4147. Nothing further.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC2 E1; CH7; Nicholas Prange

Vehicle Fire; INC#1755; 09:08PM; 3821 W Jefferson Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/40tVCgF; #WestAdams; Firefighters responded to find flames consuming an RV. Fire crews quickly extinguished the flames. Paramedics treated three burn patients and transported them to a local hospital in serious condition (approximately 31-year-old female, 27-year-old male, and a 2-year-old male). LAPD Inc #4616. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E294 E94 EM11 RA26 RA29 RA43 T94; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Grass Fire; INC#0499; 10:11AM; 15700 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3aPmUFx; #SepulvedaBasin; Thirty-two LAFD firefighters (by ground only), plus LAFD Crew 3-A volunteer hand crew, anchored the fire and advanced hose lines around both flanks, while allowing the dam to be a fire break to stop the head of the fire. It took 57 minutes to stop all forward progress, limiting the burned area to two acres. Crews will remain on scene to ensure there are no hot spots or smoldering material remaining in the fire's footprint. No structures damaged. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 CW3A DT1 DZ45 E288 E39 E8138 E83 E88 HE1 T88 WT88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Grass Fire; INC#0499; 09:14AM; 15700 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3aPmUFx; #SepulvedaBasin; Approximately one-quarter-acre of grass burning, with 10mph winds. No structures threatened.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 CW3A DT1 DZ45 E288 E39 E8138 E83 E88 HE1 T88 WT88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire - Now Stopped; INC#1086; 02:29PM; 500 N Buena Vista Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/466W8Ct; #ElysianPark; Firefighters responded to reports of a brush fire in the Elysian Park area. They arrived quickly to find less than 1/10th of an acre burning, and prevented any further growth, and extinguished the flames. Crews will remain on scene to ensure all smoldering debris and hot spots are eliminated. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC2 E1 E12 E201 E203 E250 E290 E3 E44 E56 EM1 EM11 H3 H4 H7 HA3 HA4 HA7 T1 T3 T50 T90; CH5; 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1522; 07:20PM; 5255 N Bellingham Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QOXbCv; #ValleyVillage; Thirty-two LAFD firefighters quickly extinguished a kitchen fire in one unit of a three-story garden-style apartment building (bottom floor is parking) in 20 minutes (7:40pm). The fire was contained to the unit of origin, and did not spread to adjacent units. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E278 E289 E60 RA78 RA878 T60 T78 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0336; 07:46AM; 9321 N Ventura Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SuUuYc; #Chatsworth; The first 18 LAFD Firefighters, along with VCFD firefighters, extinguished the flames consuming a two-story home in 23 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E106 E107 E296 RA96 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0336; 07:23AM; 9321 N Ventura Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SuUuYc; #Chatsworth; Fire showing from the second floor of a two-story single-family home. Offensive mode.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC17 E106 E107 E296 RA96 T96; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange
